name: Defense Spaceship
description:
A spaceship is trying to destroy your planet! Do not allow! Return the shot! Hit the opposing planet!

Simple game to control: the most relevant commands are moving left and right;

Shots can get faster when returned;

Maximum simultaneous shots on the screen = game level

(You can shot only when there are less shots on the screen than the game level).

By beating a level, the next level will allow more simultaneous shots on the screen.

Whoever clears the opponent's score in each level wins.

Commands:

Go left: Left Arrow or A

Go Right: Right Arrow or D

Shoot (when is allowed): Up Arrow, W, X or Z.

Start level or confirm: Enter

Pause: P

Demo version goes up to level 3 (3 simultaneous shots on the screen).

Full version has many more levels.

Thank you!
